name: es-get-iterator

1.0.0.name: es-get-iterator
1.0.0.description: Get an iterator for any JS language value. Works robustly across all environments, all versions.

scripts.postversion: auto-changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-edit --amend && git tag -f "v$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)")"
